author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-2532: Javadoc of inPlace field in Grid class is incomplete

author: ate
msg: Adding an (jetspeed-security) internal UserPasswordCredentialAccessManager SPI interface.
This allows loading a PasswordCredential by userName only (useful for default authenticationProvider implementation).
Additionally, the User reference in the PasswordCredential is *not* automatically loaded anymore, to be as lightweight as possible, again for authentication purposes.
And adding a PasswordCredential type field for storing historic credentials values and separating the (internal only) retrieval of them.

author: johnh
msg: Trivial change removing duplicated rewriting logic in AbstractHttpCache. All this related code will be removed soon (see SHINDIG-579), but I wanted to remove this in preparation of that work.
